author: andschwa
body: .NET Core is now packaged nicely  https   dotnet.github.io core getting started  With a Dockerfile for setting up DNVM  https   hub.docker.com r microsoft aspnet   dockerfile   With this all setup, we could start using the official builds of CoreCLR FX and their builds of xUnit all through NuGet.  However, the problem of reference assemblies blocks this still. Following up with the CoreCLR team.  Garret is actually working on this quite successfully.  VSO create date - 9/25/2015 11:37:00
title: Switch do DNVM
